name: Novell Login for Linux

screenshots.caption: Screenshot of the script executed in Ubuntu 11.10

short_description: Novell Login for Linux is a very simple perl script to enable a GUI login and logout options for Linux based OS. It is a perfect replacement for the native Novell client if you can't get it working on the not-so-common Linux distributions. Feel free to tweak the script at your own risk!
summary: A perl script to enable logging into a Novell server from a Linux OS.
